entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist, a wizard who is on a quest to find and destroy Horcruxes.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, a skilled witch who helps him in his quest.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, a dark wizard who created Horcruxes to ensure his immortality.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for wizards and witches where Harry and Hermione are students.

entities.name: london
entities.description: The city in which the orphanage where Voldemort was raised is located.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: A magical object that allows its wearer to become invisible.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are friends and companions in their quest to find and destroy Horcruxes.
Voldemort is the enemy of Harry, who is trying to defeat him by destroying his Horcruxes.
Harry is a student at Hogwarts school, where he learns about magic and helps in the fight against Voldemort.
Hermione travels to London with Harry to search for clues about Voldemort's past.
